Structs/Siblings.html#/s:6Fluent8Sibling.abstract: Returns true if the supplied model is attached to this relationship.

Structs/Children.html.name: Children

Protocols/TransactionSupporting.html#/s:.name: transactionExecute(_:on:)

Protocols/SchemaSupporting.html#/s:6Flue.name: schemaExecute(_:on:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: Output

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryExecute(_:on:into:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryDecode(_:entity:as:on:)
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: Decodes a decodable type D from this database’s output. This method will be used by Fluent to

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryEncode(_:entity:)
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: Encodes an encodable object into this database’s input. This will be used by Fluent to encode types

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: QueryAction
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: Specific query type, usually create, read, update, delete.

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryActionCreate

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryActionRead

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryActionUpdate

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryActionDelete

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryActionIsCreate(_:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryActionApply(_:to:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: QueryAggregate
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: Aggregates generate data for every row of returned data. They usually aggregate data for a single field,

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryAggregateCount
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: Counts the number of matching entities.

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryAggregateSum
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: Adds all values of the chosen field.

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryAggregateAverage

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryAggregateMinimum

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryAggregateMaximum

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryDataSet(_:to:on:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryDataApply(_:to:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: QueryField

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryField(_:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryFilterMethodGreaterThan
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: <blockquote>

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryFilterMethodGreaterThanOrEqual

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: QueryFilterValue

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryFilterValue(_:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryFilterValueNil
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: Indicates a nil filter value.

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: QueryFilter

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryFilter(_:_:_:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryFilters(for:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryFilterApply(_:to:)
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: Applies an instance of QueryFilter to the mutable query.

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: QueryFilterRelation
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: Associated filter group relation type. Describes how filters can be related.

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryFilterRelationAnd
Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.abstract: &&

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryDefaultFilterRelation(_:on:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryKeyAll

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: queryAggregate(_:_:)

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: querySortDirectionDescending

Protocols/QuerySupporting.html#/s:6Fluen.name: querySortApply(_:to:)

Protocols/AnyModel.html#/s:6Fluent8AnyMo.name: name

Protocols/Model.html#/s:6Fluent5ModelP12.name: createdAtKey
Protocols/Model.html#/s:6Fluent5ModelP12.abstract: The date at which this model was created. nil if the model has not been created yet.

Protocols/Model.html#/s:6Fluent5ModelP12.name: deletedAtKey

Protocols/Model.html#/s:6Fluent5ModelPAA.name: update(on:originalID:)
Protocols/Model.html#/s:6Fluent5ModelPAA.abstract: Updates the model. This requires that the model has its ID set.

Protocols/Model.html#/s:6Fluent5ModelPAA.abstract: Restores a soft deleted model.

Protocols/Model.html#/s:6Fluent5ModelPAA.name: requireID()
